***

Welcome!

This website will provide details of a project inferring differential gene expression in Major Depression based on GWAS summary statistics and summary-level gene expression data, an approach called Transcriptome-wide Association Study (TWAS).

***

#### Contents:

* [Dall'Aglio, Lewis, Pain: Delineating the Genetic Component of Gene Expression in Major Depression](https://opain.github.io/MDD-TWAS/MDD-TWAS.html)
